name: Fabulous Joe
description:
Fabulous Joe is a  shooter, arcade style game. It was a 12 week university project.   All assets used are from the unity asset store.

Controls

  • WASD for movement
  • Mouse to look around
  • Left mouse click and hold to fire fabulous arrows

Objective

Become fabulous by shooting goblins and getting a high score! Tell your friends and challenge them to see who is most fabulous!
